greeting: Hello! I'm your medical assistant. Please describe your symptoms.
more_symptoms_needed: Thank you. I need {remaining} more symptoms to provide a better assessment. Please continue describing your symptoms.
enough_symptoms: Thank you for providing your symptoms. Let me analyze them for you.
diagnosis_response: Based on your symptoms, the possible conditions are: {conditions}. Please note that this is not a definitive diagnosis and you should consult a healthcare professional.
goodbye: Thank you for using our medical assistant. Take care and feel better soon!
